title: Exploring the Solar System
description: In this lesson, students will learn about the solar system, including the planets, the sun, and how they all work together. They will make connections to what they already know about space and explore the wonders of our universe.

prompts.input: Why do you think the sun is important for the planets in our solar system?
hints: Think about how the sun helps plants and animals on Earth.
What do you think would happen to the planets without the sun?

prompts.input: How would you explain the differences between Earth and Mars to a friend?
hints: Consider what you know about the weather and land on both planets.
What makes Earth special for living things compared to Mars?

subject: Science
